AUTOMATIC_DATABASE_BACKUPS.description: Automatically create database backups every time the server starts up. Keeps a maximum of 5 backups, automatically deleting the oldest when the limit is reached.

LOCK_PROFILE.description: When enabled, this profile will be skipped when using 'Copy to All Profiles' functionality. It will also not be deleted when you Delete All Character Profiles. Can not be toggled for the default profile.

HERIKA_NAME.description:
NPC Name. MUST MATCH their Skyrim in-game NPC name!
If you are in the default profile YOU MUST leave it as The Narrator!
You can change profiles by clicking the blue button in the top left.

PROMPT_HEAD.description: System Prompt. Defines the rules of the roleplay.

PLAYER_BIOS.description: Player character description. Any info here will be known by all AI NPC's.

PLAYER_SPEECH_STYLE.description: Instructions for how the player character speaks and communicates. This will be used as context when rewriting player dialogue.

HERIKA_BACKGROUND.description:
NPC Background.
Detailed history, origins, and past experiences that shaped this character.

HERIKA_PERSONALITY.description:
NPC Personality Traits.
Detailed character traits, behavioral patterns, and psychological characteristics.

HERIKA_APPEARANCE.description:
NPC Physical Appearance.
Detailed description of physical features. Do not include clothing or equipment.

HERIKA_RELATIONSHIPS.description:
NPC Relationships.
Important relationships with other characters, family, friends, enemies, and social connections.

HERIKA_OCCUPATION.description:
NPC Occupation & Role.
Current job, profession, duties, and position in society or organizations.

HERIKA_SKILLS.description:
NPC Skills & Abilities.
Special talents, combat abilities, magical knowledge, and areas of expertise.

HERIKA_SPEECHSTYLE.description:
NPC Speech Style.
How this character speaks, including vocabulary, accent, mannerisms, and communication patterns.

HERIKA_GOALS.description:
NPC Goals & Aspirations.
Long-term objectives, personal ambitions, and life goals that drive this character.

DYNAMIC_PROFILE.description: Will automatically update selected profile fields from the timer set in the MCM menu. Can adjust the prompts used by editing individual DYNAMIC_PROMPT fields. Requires CONNECTOR_DIARY to be configured.

DYNAMIC_PROFILE_FIELDS.description: Only recommend selecting 1-3 fields! Select which extended profile fields should be dynamically updated from ingame Dynamic Profile Timer.

DIARY_COOLDOWN.description: Cooldown period in seconds between diary entries to prevent spam. Each NPC has their own independent cooldown timer.

AUTO_DIARY.description: Automatically create diary entries for all current followers when sleeping. Wait events are controlled by AUTO_DIARY_WAIT setting.

AUTO_DIARY_WAIT.description: When AUTO_DIARY is enabled, this controls whether diary entries are created during wait events. If false, auto diary will only trigger on sleep events.

MINIME_T5.description:
Enable Minime-T5 LLM. Helps dumber LLM's be more accurate with action and memory functions. Must be installed in the CHIM Launcher.
Must be configured in default profile and only works in English!

OGHMA_INFINIUM.description: Needs Minime-T5 enabled and running. Tamriel lore information will be added to the prompt, enhancing their understanding on specific topics.

OGHMA_KNOWLEDGE.description: Knowledge Classes assigned to the NPC. Effects what articles they can access in the Oghma database. If you want to add more make sure they are comma separated. Recommend to leave as default.

OGHMA_AMOUNT.description: Number of Oghma keywords to extract from each response. More keyword extraction will mean longer response times.

RECHAT_H.description:
Rechat Rounds. Higher values will increase the amount of times AI NPC's will go back-and-forth during a conversation.
1 = 1 Round | 2 = 2 Rounds | 3 = 3 Rounds etc

RECHAT_P.description:
Rechat Probability. Chance that an AI NPC will continue an ongoing conversation.
0 = Never | 50 = 50% | 100 = Always

RECHAT_ALLOW_ACTIONS.description: Allow AI NPCs to trigger actions between eachother during Rechat. This can cause some chaos...

BORED_EVENT.description:
Bored Event Probability. Chance of an AI NPC starting a random conversation every couple of minutes.
0 = Never | 50 = 50% | 100 = Always

BORED_EVENT_SERVERSIDE.description: Smart Bored Events. Will use the director to generate dynamic bored event topics. It is slower but topics will improve the quality of bored event topics.

CONTEXT_HISTORY.description:
Amount of context history (dialogue and events) that will be sent to LLM. Improves short term memory.
Higher Context = more tokens used and slower response time.
We recommend you do not go over 100

CONTEXT_HISTORY_DIARY.description:
Amount of context history (dialogue and events) that will be sent to LLM specifically for diary entries.
If set to 0, will use the regular CONTEXT_HISTORY value instead.

CONTEXT_HISTORY_DYNAMIC_PROFILE.description:
Amount of context history (dialogue and events) that will be sent to LLM specifically for dynamic profile updates.
If set to 0, will use the regular CONTEXT_HISTORY value instead.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Whether the I am alive.. response will trigger whenever you activate an AI NPC.

BOOK_EVENT_FULL.description: Send full contents of book instead of only the book title to the AI. This will consume more tokens, but the AI will accurately summarize any book or note!

BOOK_EVENT_ALWAYS_NARRATOR.description:
The Narrator will be the only one to summarize books.
SET THIS ON default profile to apply to all NPCs.

NARRATOR_WELCOME.description: The Narrator will give you a quick recap of what happened previously after you have loaded a save game. Has a 10 minute IRL cooldown so its not annoying.

QUEST_COMMENT.description: Will trigger AI (NPCs and Narrator) to talk about new objectives in your current active quest. Will trigger a lot of events on a new character, so leave disabled until you complete the tutorial!

QUEST_COMMENT_CHANCE.description: Chance that an AI Quest Comment will happen every time a quest updates.

CURRENT_TASK.description: Include the current Dynamic AI Objective to the AI NPC's prompt. Disable this if the AI NPC becomes fixated on the task.

RPG_COMMENTS.description: Pick which comments you want a chance to trigger when one of these ingame events happens.

DETECT_MAGIC_EVENT.description: Enable detection and logging of spellcasting events. When disabled, spellcast events will not be logged to the context log.

MAGIC_EVENT_BLACKLIST.description: Comma-separated list of magic event names to exclude from logging (e.g. 'Administer Mixture, [BFCO-AttackSwingFX] 0.5/1.5, Healing').

HERIKA_ANIMATIONS.description: Will issue animations for the NPC to play

CORE_LANG.description: Custom Language. The lang folder is in the CHIM Server. Leave it blank for English.

LANG_LLM_XTTS.description: XTTS Only! Will offer a language field to LLM, and will try match to XTTSv2 language.

MAX_WORDS_LIMIT.description: Enforce a word limit for AI's responses. Leave as 0 to have no limit.

JSON_DIALOGUE_FORMAT_REORDER.description: Reorders properties in the output JSON schema. AI generates an action first, then a dialogue comment. Some users report this improves actions performance.

EMOTEMOODS.description: List of moods passed to LLM (comma separated). Some of them will trigger appropriate animations if animations are enabled

ENFORCE_ACTIONS_PROMPT.description: Adds a prompt to enforce use of actions

SUMMARY_PROMPT.description: Default profile only! Custom instructions added when generating summaries for memories. You can adjust max tokens by changing MAX_TOKENS_MEMORY for the SUMMARY connector you are using.

DYNAMIC_PROMPT.description: Default profile only! Legacy instructions for updating HERIKA_DYNAMIC. You can adjust max tokens by changing MAX_TOKENS_MEMORY for the SUMMARY connector you are using.

DYNAMIC_PROMPT_PERSONALITY.description: Default profile only! Instructions for updating NPC personality traits based on recent events and interactions.

DYNAMIC_PROMPT_RELATIONSHIPS.description: Default profile only! Instructions for updating NPC relationships based on recent interactions with other characters.

DYNAMIC_PROMPT_OCCUPATION.description: Default profile only! Instructions for updating NPC occupation and role based on story progression and events.

DYNAMIC_PROMPT_SKILLS.description: Default profile only! Instructions for updating NPC skills and abilities based on experiences and training.

DYNAMIC_PROMPT_SPEECHSTYLE.description: Default profile only! Instructions for updating NPC speech patterns and communication style based on interactions.

DYNAMIC_PROMPT_GOALS.description: Default profile only! Instructions for updating NPC goals and aspirations based on story developments and achievements.

DIARY_PROMPT.description: Default profile only! Instructions for generating diary entries. You can adjust max tokens by changing MAX_TOKENS_MEMORY for the DIARY connector you are using.

CONNECTORS.description:
AI Service(s) to be used for most AI features.
Select the service(s) you have configured for AI/LLM Connectors below.
Non JSON connectors are legacy and no longer supported. We can not debug or fix any issues you have with them!

Make sure to click the Current AI Service button at the top of the page if you change connectors!

CONNECTORS_DIARY.description:
Is one of the SUMMARY connectors. Used for creating diary entries, dynamic profiles and summarized memories!

You will need to place your API key in the (SUMMARY) connector for this to work!

HERIKA_DYNAMIC.description: Deprecated. Use the new fields listed above instead.

CORE_CONNECTOR_MEDIUMTERM.description: Connector used to generate mid-term memories. Should have very long context >32k. Use a cheap one!.

CORE_CONNECTOR_PROFILES.description: Connector used to generate/update NPC profiles

model.description:
Must be JSON/Instruct type of Model!
FREE MODELS ARE NOT RECOMMENDED!

reasoning_model.description: Select True if this is a reasoning model and you want to remove CoT (text between 'think' tags).

disable_model_reasoning.description: If this is a reasoning/hybrid model, select True to disable reasoning and get faster responses.

fallback_models.description: List of fallback models to use when the main model returns an error. Comma-separated list.

PROVIDER.description: Leave blank unless you want to manually select providers from OpenRouter. Comma-separated case sensitive list.

providers_to_ignore.description: Providers to ignore. Comma-separated case sensitive list.

provider_quantizations.description: Quantization levels to filter by. Comma-separated case sensitive list. Values: int4,int8,fp4,fp6,fp8,fp16,bf16,fp32,unknown

provider_max_price_input.description: Use only providers that have lower input price per milion tokens. Zero to disable filter.

provider_max_price_output.description: Use only providers that have lower output price per milion tokens. Zero to disable filter.

get_parms1.description: Autofill parameter settings for the currently selected model for minimal randomness in AI response (P10)
get_parms1.name: Autofill Parameters: Low Randomness

get_parms5.description: Autofill parameter settings for the currently selected model for some randomness in AI response (P50)
get_parms5.name: Autofill Parameters: Medium Randomness

get_parms9.description: Autofill parameter settings for the currently selected model for high randomness in AI response (P90)
get_parms9.name: Autofill Parameters: High Randomness

ENFORCE_JSON.description: Will attempt to enforce dumb LLM's to stay in JSON format. Leave as default (TRUE), only works with specific models.

PREFILL_JSON.description: Will attempt to prefill the JSON AI response for some dumber LLM's. Leave as default (FALSE), only works with specific models.

MAX_TOKENS_MEMORY.description: No longer used. Use SUMMARY connector for memory tokens instead.

json_schema.description: Enable OpenRouter Json schema. Does not work with all models. You must set a provider that supports structured outputs. Requires ENFORCE_JSON to be true.

model.description:
Model to use.
FREE MODELS ARE NOT RECOMMENDED!

reasoning_model.description: Select True if this is a reasoning model and you want to remove CoT (text between 'think' tags).

disable_model_reasoning.description: If this is a reasoning/hybrid model, select True to disable reasoning and get faster responses

fallback_models.description: List of fallback models to use when the main model returns an error. Comma-separated list.

PROVIDER.description: Leave blank unless you want to manually select providers from OpenRouter. Comma-separated case sensitive list.

providers_to_ignore.description: Providers to ignore. Comma-separated case sensitive list.

provider_quantizations.description: Quantization levels to filter by. Comma-separated case sensitive list. Values: int4,int8,fp4,fp6,fp8,fp16,bf16,fp32,unknown

provider_max_price_input.description: Use only providers that have lower input price per milion tokens. Zero to disable filter.

provider_max_price_output.description: Use only providers that have lower output price per milion tokens. Zero to disable filter.

max_tokens.description: Maximum tokens to generate for regular responses, NOT SUMMARIES.

MAX_TOKENS_MEMORY.description: Maximum tokens to generate when summarizing, diary entries, and dynamic profile updates.

get_parms1.description: Autofill parameter settings for the currently selected model for minimal randomness in AI response (P10)
get_parms1.name: Autofill Parameters: Low Randomness

get_parms5.description: Autofill parameter settings for the currently selected model for some randomness in AI response (P50)
get_parms5.name: Autofill Parameters: Medium Randomness

get_parms9.description: Autofill parameter settings for the currently selected model for high randomness in AI response (P90)
get_parms9.name: Autofill Parameters: High Randomness

reasoning_model.description: Select True if this is a reasoning model and you want to remove CoT.

disable_model_reasoning.description: If this is a reasoning/hybrid model, select True to disable reasoning and get faster responses

MAX_TOKENS_MEMORY.description: No longer used. Use SUMMARY connector for memory tokens instead.

json_schema.description: Enable OpenAI Json schema. Does not work with all OpenAI's models

reasoning_model.description: Select True if this is a reasoning model and you want to remove CoT.

disable_model_reasoning.description: If this is a reasoning/hybrid model, select True to disable reasoning and get faster responses

max_tokens.description: Maximum tokens to generate for regular responses, NOT SUMMARIES.

MAX_TOKENS_MEMORY.description: Maximum tokens to generate when summarizing, diary entries, and dynamic profile updates.
Maximum tokens to generate when summarizing, diary entries, and dynamic profile updates.

url.description:
Kobold should be running on the same machine as DwemerDistro!
Must use your computers, not the DwemerDistro, IP Address.
Can be found by running the command 'ipconfig' in your CMD prompt.
Example: http://your-local-ip:8008

PREFILL_JSON.description: Will prefill JSON, which is useful for some AI models, and destroy others.

MAX_TOKENS_MEMORY.description: No longer used. Use SUMMARY connector for memory tokens instead.

newline_as_stopseq.description: A new line in the output that will be considered a stop sequence. Recommended to leave as default.

use_default_badwordsids.description: Unban End of Sentence (EOS) tokens. If set to false the LLM will stop generating when it detects an EOS token.

eos_token.description: EOS token LLM uses. Only works if use_default_badwordsids is enabled.

template.description: Prompt Format. Specified in the HuggingFace model card

grammar.description: Enforces use of JSON grammar. True to enforce (generation speed loss, but json format guaranteed). if false, the generation speed will be better but will depend on the model to produce valid JSON output.

url.description:
Kobold should be running on the same machine as DwemerDistro!
Must use your computers, not the DwemerDistro, IP Address.
Can be found by running the command 'ipconfig' in your CMD prompt.
Example: http://your-local-ip:8008

max_tokens.description: Maximum tokens to generate for regular responses, NOT SUMMARIES.

MAX_TOKENS_MEMORY.description: Maximum tokens to generate when summarizing, diary entries, and dynamic profile updates.

newline_as_stopseq.description: A new line in the output that will be considered a stop sequence. Recommended to leave as default.

use_default_badwordsids.description: Unban End of Sentence (EOS) tokens. If set to false the LLM will stop generating when it detects an EOS token.

eos_token.description: EOS token LLM uses. Only works if use_default_badwordsids is enabled.

template.description: Prompt Format. Specified in the HuggingFace model card

url.description: Player2 should be running on the same machine as DwemerDistro! Will connect automatically so do not change the URL. Does not currently support Chat Assist/Creation.

TTSFUNCTION.description: Text-to-Speech service options. Used to generate AI NPC voice.

endpoint.description: Endpoint URL. Should be 'http://127.0.0.1:8084' if using default installation

language.description: Language Model. Should be EN if using default installation

voiceid.description: Voice ID. Should be set automatically for most Vanilla Skyrim NPCs. Uses Skyrim VoiceType ID, e.g. femaleeventoned. Click the help/doc link for full list of voiceids!

endpoint.description:
Endpoint URL. Leave as default if you use CHIM XTTS.
You can run it on the cloud or use Mantella XTTS. Click the help link to learn more.

voiceid.description: Generated voice file name. Click the help link to go to XTTS management.

voicelogic.description:
Default profile only. Logic used for generating [TTS XTTSFASTAPI voiceid]
voicetype = NPC voicetype ID (femalenord)
name = NPC name (mjoll_the_lioness)

url.description:
xVASynth should be running on the same machine as DwemerDistro!
Must use your computers IP Address.
Can be found by running the command 'ipconfig' in your CMD prompt.
Example: http://your-local-ip:8008
Click the help/doc link for more info.

version.description: xVASynth version (e.g. 3.0 is default. Older models are 1.0 or 2.0)

endpoint.description: Piper-TTS endpoint URL. The IP address of the machine where Piper-TTS is installed.

voiceid.description: MUST DOWNLOAD VOICES MANUALLY! CLICK HELP LINK FOR INSTRUCTIONS! Voice ID code. Model voices are stored in 'models' folder in .onnx files. Voice ID is the file name without extension.

length_scale.description: speaking time scale. Use a value over 1.0 to play slower, a value under 1.0 is faster.

noise_scale.description: speaking variability. Leave 0 to use voice model internal value. Experiment with values around 0.667

noise_w_scale.description: phoneme width variability. Leave 0 to use voice model internal value. Experiment with values around 0.8

speaker.description: Name of speaker for multi-speaker voices (if you have an .onnx voice file with multiple voices).

speaker_id.description: Speaker id for multi-speaker voices, overrides speaker name if used. 0 is default (first) speaker.

endpoint.description: Manual for Zonos can be found here. Endpoint URL. Can be ran on : Vast.ai

model.description: Default profile only. Model to use.

dynamic_tones.description: Default profile only. Enhance emotional quality by requesting values from the LLM. If false, emotions will be determined by the LLM-selected mood.

voiceid.description: Generated voice file name. Works the same as CHIM-XTTS voiceid and uses its voicelogic setting. Will only work with voices in your Voice Cache.

cfg_scale.description: CFG scale. Controls how closely the audio matches the sample voice. Higher numbers will be a closer match. [1.1 - 5]

cached_voice_path.description: Path to the sample audio stored in zonos. Leave as default; it is set automatically.

region.description: Region location of your API key

instructions.description: Control the voice of your generated audio with additional instructions. Does not work with tts-1 or tts-1-hd.

GCP_SA_FILEPATH.description: Google Cloud Platform auth file. Should be placed in the data folder.

TTSFUNCTION_PLAYER.description: Text-to-Speech service options. Used to generate your voice.

TTSFUNCTION_PLAYER_VOICE.description: VoiceID to use for the player character.

TTSFUNCTION_PLAYER_VOICE_ID.description: Speaker ID to select a voice from multi-voice model.

TTSFUNCTION_PLAYER_LANGUAGE.description:
Overrides the TTS language for the player character.
If blank, the NPC's TTS language will be used.

TRANSLATION_FUNCTION.description: Translate subtitles and/or audio into a different language.

translate_audio.description: This NPC's audio will be translated to the target language.

translate_text.description: This NPC's subtitles will be translated to the target language.

save_translated_text.description: Replaces the NPC's speech in the context history with the translation. Only used if translate_audio or translate_text is true.

translate_player_audio.description: When speaking to this NPC, Player TTS audio will be translated to the player target language.

save_translated_player_text.description:
Replaces the player's input in the context history with the translation. Only used if translate_player_audio is true.
Note: player subtitles are always displayed in their original language.

source_language.description:
This NPC's source language to be translated from. This should be the language that the LLM responds with.
May be left blank for auto-detection.

target_language.description: This NPC's target language to be translated into. Required.

url.description:
DeepL endpoint url. Default profile only.
Free: https://api-free.deepl.com/v2/translate
Pro: https://api.deepl.com/v2/translate

player_source_language.description:
Player's source language to be translated from. This should be the language you speak with STT or input by text.
May be left blank for auto-detection.

player_target_language.description: Player's target language to be translated into.

API_KEY.description:
DeepL api key. Default profile only.
Required even when using the free version.

PLAYER_RESPEECH.description: Use default diary connector AI to rewrite player speech Currently only triggers when strating speech with **

STTFUNCTION.description: Speech-to-Text service options. Translates your voice to text.

TRANSLATE.description: Will try to translate to english.

API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key. Same used for OpenAI/ChatGPT AI service.

profanity.description:
Specifies how to handle profanity in recognition results. Accepted values are:
MASKED, which replaces profanity with asterisks.
REMOVED, which removes all profanity from the result.
RAW, which includes profanity in the result.

API_KEY.description: Azure API key. Same used for Azure TTS Service.

URL.description: Local whisper endpoint. Leave as Default if you installed whisper through the Distro.

FORMFIELD.description: Form field name for audio file. Sometimes needed to change to file to use another shiper implementations

ITTFUNCTION.description:
Image recognition aka Soulgaze spell. OpenAI also works as a connector to OpenRouter!

Must be configured in default profile!

quality.description: Only when using Soulgaze HD. Compression quality from 0 (lower and unusable) to 100 (near no compression). More quality means higher file size, ergo more tokens.

url.description: OpenAI API or OpenRouter endpoint. Use this for OpenRouter (https://openrouter.ai/api/v1/chat/completions)

detail.description: Low or high fidelity image understanding

AI_VISION_PROMPT.description: Prompt to send to the OpenAI vision model.

AI_PROMPT.description: Prompt for the AI NPC to follow when describing the scene.

detail.description: Low or high fidelity image understanding

AI_VISION_PROMPT.description: Prompt to send to the OpenAI vision model.

AI_PROMPT.description: Prompt for the AI NPC to follow when describing the scene.

AI_VISION_PROMPT.description: Prompt to send to the llama vision model.

AI_PROMPT.description: Prompt for the AI NPC to follow when describing the scene.

ENABLED.description: Make sure CONNECTORS_DIARY is setup! Enable long term memory. It will provide the most relevant memory with every AI response to be used as context.

TXTAI_URL.description: TXT2VEC from DwemerDistro. Make sure its set to http://127.0.0.1:8082

USE_TEXT2VEC.description: Use TXT2VEC to create embeddings for memories. These are more accurate than keywords.

MEMORY_TIME_DELAY.description: Time in minutes to delay before using a memory in a prompt. Used to avoid pushing recent dialogues as memories.

MEMORY_CONTEXT_SIZE.description: The amount of the most relevant memory records that will be injected into the prompt.

AUTO_CREATE_SUMMARYS.description: Will combine individual memory logs into larger ones. Is more accurate for memory recollection but will use up more tokens. If using koboldcpp, use the multiuser mode to avoid locking.

AUTO_CREATE_SUMMARY_INTERVAL.description: Time frame used to pack summary data. 10 = 13 in-game hours | 5 = 7.5 in-game hours etc

MEMORY_BIAS_A.description: From 0 (never) to 100 (always). Minimal distance to offer memory.

MEMORY_BIAS_B.description: From 0 (never) to 100 (always). Minimal distance to offer and endorse memory.

MISC._title: Experimental Options (Use at your own risk!)

ADD_TIME_MARKS.description: Add timestamps to the context logs. Helps with memory recollection.

ITT_QUALITY.description: Only for Soulgaze HD. Compression quality can be set from 0 (lower and unusable) to 100 (near no compression). More quality means higher file size, ergo more tokens.

TTS_RANDOM_PITCH.description: WIP DO NOT USE! Adjusting the pitch when generating the voice for this actor will add variation, so actors using the same voice sound slightly distinct.

LIFE_LINK_PLUGIN.description: WIP. Is disabled currently, do not enable is a work in progress.
